ygData.subject: Re: DarkForge Armor Question
ygData.msgSnippet: I just got the boots 2 nights ago and it is NO DROP. I have asked other friends if theres is still NO DROP, and the answers are still yes. Why the Helm would
ygData.messageBody:
I just got the boots 2 nights ago and it is NO DROP.
I have asked other friends if theres is still NO DROP,
and the answers are still yes.
Why the Helm would be an exception is beyond me. But i
would rather this fact didnt srpread :)
Like you i fully support the NO DROP decision

--- "Wilson, ThomasX B" <thomasx.b.wilson@...>
wrote:
> Ok I've seen screen shots of this armor in the past
> and noticed that it was
> No Drop. I recently saw a picture of the Helm and
> noticed that it was not No
> Drop. So is it just this piece that doesn't have the
> No Drop restriction or
> have they removed it from all pieces?
>
> My personal opinion is that I would want all the
> pieces No Drop, that way we
> don't have other classes harvesting the armor and
> also it's kind of like a
> status symbol (You had to do the quest to get it).
> Of course as of yet I
> haven't got any of the new armor (the whole camping
> Cazic thing doesn't have
> me too excited)..
>
> Enjoy...
>
> Thom
>
>
